Name: Wagner
Title: Wagner, Blacksmith
Desc: "Smithing is not dependent on brute strength. You need the sweat on your brow from constant hard work, and perseverance stronger than the metals we forge!"
Source: Reward for accepting Wagner's Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Wagner
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When played:</color> Comes with 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Forging Billets</color>. If your deck originally includes at least 3 different types of {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapons, you will randomly also draw 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon Card from your deck.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> This card will gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Forging Billet</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When playing a {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon Card:</color> If possible, spend <color=#FFFFFFFF>Forging Billets</color> equal to the total cost of the {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon and equip this {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon for free. (Once per Round)
